content: **materials ** worsted weight yarn i used lion brand vanna s choice in terracotta orange white and black size h crochet hook two black buttons about 1/2 inch round tapestry needle **abbreviations ** magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet single_crochet decrease = single_crochet decrease half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet half_double_crochet decrease = half_double_crochet decrease double_crochet = double_crochet
